title.value: Provides list of all deactivate users.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing

dql_value.value: select adt.deactivated_time,usr.user_name,usr.user_address,usr.failed_auth_attempt,usr.first_failed_auth_utc_time as "first_failed_auth_time" from dm_user usr, (select audited_obj_id,max(time_stamp_utc) as deactivated_time from dm_audittrail where event_name = 'dm_save' and ((attribute_list like '%user_state=1%' and attribute_list_old not like '%user_state=1%') or (attribute_list like '%user_state=2%' and attribute_list_old not like '%user_state=2%') or (attribute_list like '%user_state=3%' and attribute_list_old not like '%user_state=3%')) group by audited_obj_id) adt where usr.user_state >=1 and usr.failed_auth_attempt<5 and usr.r_object_id=adt.audited_obj_id UNION select deactivated_utc_time, user_name, user_address, failed_auth_attempt, first_failed_auth_utc_time from dm_user where user_state >= 1 and failed_auth_attempt>=5 order by 1 desc, 2
